description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS Supernatural News ParaShare Seasons Greetings Edition with Dave Schrader & Tim Dennis!

Texas invites us to view its black hole, we witness Ghosts in Fancy Dress, Boos at a Brothel PLUS Your Calls and emails of Paranormal Encounters!

Get your cool paranormal swag here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

Support our sponsors for great deals!

Are you playing along with Beyond the Darkness on the Podcast One/ Betonline.AG Sportsnet Challenge?! Each Week Dave and Tim are picking the winners of five NFL gam,es and playing against the hosts of different Podcast One shows! If you play aloing with Dave and Tim on BetOnline.AG, and they win the week, you qualify to be one of five winners splitting a $500 weekly prize! Our premium CBD will keep your head clear and help you feel your best. Become a member today by going to Feals.com/darkness and you'll get 50% off your first order with free shipping.

Luckily, Talkspace online therapy gives you a convenient and affordable way to improve your mental health. Our listeners can get $100 off their first month by using code DARKNESS at talkspace.com right now!
